scripts.build:local: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir docs/ --public-url / --no-optimize && npm run copy:all
scripts.build:notebook: npm run clean:notebook && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir notebook/ --public-url /notebook/ --no-optimize && mkdir notebook/examples notebook/icon notebook/lib notebook/legal && cp src/examples/* notebook/examples/. && cp src/icon/* notebook/icon/. && cp src/lib/* notebook/lib/. && cp src/legal/* notebook/legal/.
scripts.build:github: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir docs/ --public-url /notebook/ && npm run copy:all
scripts.deploy:github: npm run build:github && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to Github $(date)" && git push github main
scripts.build:apps: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir docs/ --public-url /notebook/ && npm run copy:all
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:examples && npm run copy:lib && npm run copy:legal
